name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ted Cruz is The Zodiac Killer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces every instance of Ted Cruz with The Zodiac Killer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension caters to America's needs by replacing every instance of 'Ted Cruz' with 'The Zodiac Killer'. Everyone should install this extension so that we never forget the horrible crimes of the Zodiac Killer and the man responsible.
